description:
NewChat is a new way of communication.

With advanced blockchain technology, users can freely interact with friends around the world and openly trade with virtual coins. Through NewChat, users can keep intouch with friends anywhere in the world without worrying the language barrier, and discover the trending contents from Newchat’s daily recommendation list. Popular users can receive awards so that they will produce more interesting posts. Sharing stories with friends is never this easy. Users can leave comments under their favorite posts.
name: NewChat
